name: Easy YouTube Automate
author: Wondercode

sections.description:
Easy YouTube Automate allows you to enrich your content with relevant YouTube videos either by searching for them using keywords or by automatically attaching videos that match your post’s title.

Main Features

  • Gutenberg Block Integration: Easily add YouTube videos to your posts using the Gutenberg editor. Our custom block can be placed anywhere in your post layout.
  • Keyword Search Functionality: Not sure which video to add? Simply type a keyword into the search feature within the block, and instantly fetch related YouTube videos to choose from.
  • Automatic Video Insertion: Save time by enabling the plugin to automatically add a video related to the title of your post. This feature ensures that your content is always enhanced with relevant multimedia, increasing engagement and viewership.
  • SEO Benefits: Improve your site’s SEO by keeping visitors engaged with high-quality video content directly related to your posts.

Translations

  • French

Third-Party Services

Easy YouTube Automate integrates with external third-party services to enhance its functionality. Specifically, it makes requests to the YouTube Data API to search for and retrieve video information based on specified keywords.

  • Google YouTube Data API
  • Google APIs Terms of Service
  • Get API Key

Support the plugin

If you’ve found the plugin useful, please consider making a donation. Thank you for your support !
sections.installation:
1. Activate the plugin.
  2. Go to the menu tab “Easy YouTube Automate” tab.
  3. Configure your settings : YouTube API Key, language & others settings
  4. Go into a post, you can add the “Easy YouTube Automate” Gutenberg Block
  5. Search with one or multiple keywords and choose which video you want to insert.

short_description: Enhance content with Easy YouTube Automate, adding relevant videos via keyword search or automatic title matching.
